sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Introduction of Noelictus culture, Belavierr's influence, Guild indulgences. Cara O’Sullivan emerges, Guild foundations shown.

sections.title: Royal Family & Nobility
sections.content: King Nicte Allorev, eccentric monarch; Princess Kadane; extended nobles linked to crypt seals.

sections.title: Hunters & Guild
sections.content: Hunter's Guild traditions of corpse-sitting, indulgences based on sins (influenced by Belavierr). Veterans rule doctrine.

sections.title: Key Events
sections.content: Cara’s early songs disturb and inspire. Necromancer skirmishes occur. Belavierr’s bargains affect Guild indulgences.

sections.title: Nyx Threads
sections.content: Nyx encounters unannounced threats such as 'Darryn' shadows — personal dangers woven into quiet moments between canon beats.
